skills.label: Implement Azure cloud data warehouses
items: May include but is not limited to: design data lake architecture, design the data schema, provision the data warehouse

skills.label: Implement No-SQL Databases
items: May include but is not limited to: manage data distribution and partitions, select the database platform, model data storage based on use cases, select storage types, provision storage accounts, provision data lake storage, integrate webhdfs applications with data lake storage, provision in cosmosdb

skills.label: Implement Azure SQL Database
items: May include but is not limited to: provision azure sql database, configure elastic pools, configure data backup strategies, configure elastic jobs, provision azure sql database managed instance, configure connections, manage data synchronization

skills.label: Implement hybrid data scenarios
items: May include but is not limited to: design hybrid solution, design data replication and synchronization

skills.label: Manage Azure DevOps Pipelines
items: May include but is not limited to: use a build service, deploy using azure resource manager templates

skills.label: Implement big data environments
items: May include but is not limited to: implement hadoop clusters, implement databricks environment

skills.label: Develop batch processing solutions
items: May include but is not limited to: develop batch processing solutions using spark, develop batch processing solutions using azure databricks

skills.label: Develop streaming solutions
items: May include but is not limited to: implement event processing using azure stream analytics, query data using azure stream analytics, configure azure stream analytics to read from event hub, configure azure stream analytics to read from blob storage

skills.label: Develop integration solutions
items: May include but is not limited to: create data pipeline systems in azure, develop data integration pipelines with azure data factory, develop data integration pipelines with azure databricks

skills.label: Implement data migration
items: May include but is not limited to: transform data, bulk load data with polybase

skills.label: Automate Data Factory Pipelines
items: May include but is not limited to: deploy data factory pipelines, configure data factory

skills.label: Manage source data access security
items: May include but is not limited to: connect to sources, create connection objects, install gateways

skills.label: Configure authentication and authorization
items: May include but is not limited to: set up firewall rules, integrate azure ad, design cosmos db security, design data lake security, design azure sql db security, manage access control, manage permissions on resources

skills.label: Manage and enforce data policies and standards
items: May include but is not limited to: mask data, encrypt data at rest, encrypt data in motion, encrypt data elements, configure audit

skills.label: Set up notifications
items: May include but is not limited to: set up alerts on security threats, set up alerts on unexpected resource usage

skills.label: Monitor data storage
items: May include but is not limited to: implement blob storage monitoring, implement data lake store monitoring, implement hdinsight monitoring

skills.label: Monitor databases for a specified scenario
items: May include but is not limited to: implement sql database monitoring, implement sql data warehouse monitoring, implement cosmos db monitoring

skills.label: Monitor data processing
items: May include but is not limited to: design and implement data factory monitoring, monitor azure databricks, monitor hdinsight processing, monitor stream analytics

label: Manage and Troubleshoot Azure Data Solutions (10-15%)

skills.label: Manage Optimization
items: May include but is not limited to: troubleshoot data partitioning bottlenecks, optimize hive processing, optimize data lake, optimize spark processing, optimize azure stream analytics, optimize data warehouse, optimize sql db, manage data life cycle

skills.label: Manage business continuity
items: May include but is not limited to: implement a disaster recovery strategy, design for high availability, import and export data, design a data retention policy
